alert.note: Alert for Bedford; Blair; Cambria (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 2:02PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL BEDFORD... SOUTHWESTERN BLAIR AND SOUTH CENTRAL CAMBRIA COUNTIES THROUGH 230 PM EDT... At 201 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong thunderstorms from Beaverdale to Ski Gap, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Hollidaysburg, Portage, Roaring Spring, Cresson, Gallitzin, Claysburg, Loretto, Duncansville, Beaverdale-Lloydell, Lilly, Sankertown, St. Michael, Ski Gap, Royer, Queen, East Freedom, Spring Hill, Tunnelhill, Newry and Wilmore. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
